TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SharedPersonalizationStateInfo extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo
Public NotInheritable Class SharedPersonalizationStateInfo Inherits PersonalizationStateInfo

summary.span: 表示有关页的共享个性化信息的轻量版本。

span.span: Represents a lightweight version of shared personalization information about a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示有关页的个性化设置状态的统计信息。This class represents statistical information about the personalization state of a page. 它不会返回个性化设置数据 (例如，在个性化设置) 时应用或提取的属性数据。It does not return the personalization data (such as property data that is applied or extracted when personalization occurs) itself. 此类可用于确定有多少用户已保存页的个性化设置以及该信息的大小（以字节为单位）。This class can be used to determine how many users have saved personalization settings for a page, and the size, in bytes, of that information.

MemberSignature.Value: public SharedPersonalizationStateInfo (string path, DateTime lastUpdatedDate, int size, int sizeOfPersonalizations, int countOfPersonalizations);

public: SharedPersonalizationStateInfo(System::String ^ path, DateTime lastUpdatedDate, int size, int sizeOfPersonalizations, int countOfPersonalizations);

param.name: path

span.span: The page that the information applies to.

param.span: 是相对于应用程序（使用波形符语法）的虚拟路径。

span.span: is an application-relative (using tilde syntax) virtual path.

param.name: lastUpdatedDate
param.span: ，指示页的共享信息的上次更新时间。

span.span: A indicating when the shared information for the page was last updated.

param.name: size
param.span: 页的共享状态信息的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the shared state information for the page.

param.name: sizeOfPersonalizations
param.span: 页的现存所有每用户个性化信息的总大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The total size, in bytes, of all per-user personalization information that exists for the page.

param.name: countOfPersonalizations
param.span: 已对页进行个性化的用户的总数。

span.span: The total number of users who have personalized the page.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `countOfPersonalizations`参数表示已对页面进行个性化的用户的总数。The `countOfPersonalizations` parameter represents the total number of users who have personalized a page. 例如，如果100用户个性化页面，则该页面的值将 `countOfPersonalizations` 是100，而不是100乘以个性化属性的数量。For example, if 100 users personalize a page, then the value of `countOfPersonalizations` for that page would be 100, not 100 multiplied by the number of personalized properties. 请注意，此计数与基础数据存储区中用于持久保存每个用户的信息的行数可能相同，也可能不匹配，因为某些数据存储提供程序使用多个行来存储单个用户和页面组合的每用户个性化设置信息。Note that this count might or might not match the total number of rows used in the underlying data store to persist per-user information, because some data storage providers use multiple rows to store per-user personalization information for a single user and page combination. 请注意， `path` 如果非 null，则会被剪裁。Note that `path` is trimmed if non-null.

span.span: , when trimmed, is an empty string ("").

public: property int CountOfPersonalizations { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取已对页进行个性化的用户的总数。

span.span: Gets the total number of users that have personalized a page.

value.span: 已应用于页的每用户个性化设置的总数。

span.span: The total number of per-user personalization settings that have been applied to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回个性化页面的用户总数。This property returns the total number of users that have personalized a page. 例如，如果100用户个性化页面，则该页面的值将 是100，而不是100乘以个性化属性的数量。For example, if 100 users personalize a page, then the value of for that page would be 100, not 100 multiplied by the number of personalized properties. 请注意，此计数与基础数据存储区中用于持久保存每个用户的信息的行数可能相同，也可能不匹配，因为某些数据存储提供程序使用多个行来存储单个用户和页面组合的每用户个性化设置信息。Note that this count might or might not match the total number of rows used in the underlying data store to persist per-user information, because some data storage providers use multiple rows to store per-user personalization information for a single user and page combination.

public: property int SizeOfPersonalizations { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取页的所有每用户个性化信息的总大小。

span.span: Gets the total size of all per-user personalization information for a page.

value.span: 页的所有个性化信息的总大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The total size, in bytes, of all personalization information for a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回页的所有每用户个性化设置信息的大小。This property returns the size of all per-user personalization information that exists for a page. 这将是返回的值不同的值 ，因为是页面的每用户状态的大小（以字节为单位），不包括值中包含的共享状态数据的大小 。This will be a different value than the value returned by because is the size in bytes of only the per-user state for a page and does not include the size of shared state data included in the value.
